MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Amlwch affecting properties in Nebo, Llaneilian and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55am on 19th November 2020.
